name: Blitz App for League of Legends
description: Installs Blitz inside the league-of-legends prefix, thus requiring league-of-legends installed first
notes:
Manually install winetricks dependencies beforehand:

`export WINEPREFIX=/path/to/league-of-legends`
`winetricks dotnet452 win7 corefonts`
content:
files:
- BlitzInstaller:
    filename: blitz-installer.exe
    url: https://dl.blitz.gg/download/windows
game:
  exe: drive_c/users/$USER/Local Settings/Application Data/Blitz/Blitz.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet452 win7 corefonts
    description: Installing prerequisites
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running Blitz app installer
    exclude_processes: Blitz.exe
    executable: BlitzInstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: league-of-legends
